ack.p: M. Merrifield and P. Thompson provided feedback on an initial draft of the paper. R. Ray provided helpful comments on the processing of the TOPEX altimeter data. K. McMenamin assisted with the analysis of the GRACE data. This study was funded by NASA Grants NNX13AI26G and NNX17AH35G (Ocean Surface Topography Science Team), NNX14AJ98G (NASA Sea Level Change Team), NNH12ZDA001N (MEaSUREs), and NNX16AH56G (NASA New Investigator Program).
